title: Walmart Drops Its Mask Rules for Vaccinated Workers
sub_head: Retailer ends Covid-19 paid-time-off policy and mask rule after several states lift mandates
body:
Walmart Inc. said Friday that vaccinated workers donâ€™t need to wear masks while on the job and it would end a special sick-pay program for Covid-19 illnesses, changing its policies after several states lifted indoor mask mandates.
The retail giant, which has about 1.6 million U.S. workers, previously required all U.S. staff to wear masks and requested shoppers wear masks in localities that required them.
